Bayesian Network modeling and analysis.

Source: R/BayesianNetwork.R
BayesianNetwork.Rd

BayesianNetwork is a Shiny web application for Bayesian Network modeling and analysis.

Usage

BayesianNetwork()

See also

http://paulgovan.github.io/BayesianNetwork/

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  BayesianNetwork()
}
